titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an John Maynard Keynes, [1913]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der King's College Library in Cambridge; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (deutsch: Briefe, S. 27; Cambridge Letters, S. 27).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Would you mind having tea with me tomorrow? If you can come please don't trouble to reply.
